title: godoc not showing all consts
body:
Duration const values in the time package don't show up under 'Constants' in godoc
output.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Goto http://golang.org/pkg/time/#constants

What is the expected output?
Expect to see Microsecond, Millisecond, Second, Minute, and Hour maybe others.

What do you see instead?
None of the mentioned constants, although they do appear under
http://golang.org/pkg/time/#Duration

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
godoc @ http://golang.org/ exhibits this problem.
